content:
Great, you've choosed the Business profil info, now, You can get 3 types of Informations, and available Operacions, just type the key words for the info you want and you'll get what you want:

 - Brand presentation : 'Your brand'
 - Team : 'Your team'
 - Works : 'Your works'
 - Office : 'Your office'
 - Services : 'Your services'

And The Operacions You can execute are :

 - Make a Reservation : Click on the menu down in the right cornner and choose 'Make a reservation'
 - Order Food : Click on the menu down in the right cornner and choose 'Make a Order'

That's it for the Business Profil, If you ever wanted to see this list of infos type: 'Help Business'

Great, you've choosed the Personal profil info, now, You can get 2 types of Informations
 - Presentation : 'Who are you?'
 - Albums : 'How much albums you've made?
 - Songs : 'Show me Your songs'
 - Next Concert : 'When will be Your next concert?'
That's it for the Personal Profil, If you ever wanted to see this list of infos type: 'Help Personal'
